attributes.title: I’m so confused
attributes.review: The “T” made me think of Teen Titans and possibly had secret clues to a new season but I was disappointed. Then when I opened the app it had an orange freak that scared me and I had to immediately delete it. No thank you!

attributes.title: Absolute hot GARBAGE
attributes.review: This app didn’t do what it what I wanted it to do and it went against everything I don’t believe in and I can’t believe our president made this app not work functionally like it’s supposed to. 1 star

attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I WOULD!!
attributes.review: I thought this was supposed to make America great again but we’re all dying and getting killed. I tried to restart it but it’s not working.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download! As soon as it was finally installed, it made my phone start to glitch and I couldn’t click on any other applications!!

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️😳🍊
attributes.review: I downloaded this app believing that I’d be informed of the news but once I opened it my little brother started dancing obnoxiously. I don’t recommend it if you don’t want your brothers or family to be possessed by an orange😳🍊

attributes.title: Sorry this is not great at alllll!!!!!!
attributes.review:
First, this took hours to get download.
Second, it’s always crashing/glitching. 
Third , My phone was really acting up after using this app. 
Fourth, Thanks for listening bye

attributes.title: Wish I’d known sooner
attributes.review:
This app is quite literally the worst piece of
software ever built. Not the mention the fact that Donal Trump is a white supremacist. Full stop. And anyone who willingly chooses to work for him is also a white supremacist. Full stop.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then dropped my phone because my dog started yelling at the top of his lungs: “TRUMP IS THE WORST PERSON ON PLANET EARTH.” So I deleted the app because my dog is the man of the house hold and I had to listen to him so I destroyed my phone. Trump had filled it with sins. 🤮🥴🤮🤮🤮🤢🤮

attributes.title: Sh!tty content
attributes.review: this app has horrible content and is extremely racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, and is paid for and sponsors a "man" who is the same. remove this app from the app store. if not for lovely tiktok, i would not have known how horrible the app is!

attributes.title: specifically for the ~cheeto~
attributes.review: it had come to my attention that after downloading this app, Leonardo DiCaprio would show up to my pool. this did not happen. all lies from the 🍊 thing in the white house.
